meanings.definition: Capable of being seen or noticed.
meanings.sent1: The bright colors made the painting very eyeable.
meanings.sent2: The fireworks display was quite eyeable from a distance.
meanings.sent3: The giant inflatable duck in the lake was definitely eyeable.
meanings.sent4: The neon sign was so eyeable, it could be seen from miles away.
meanings.sent5: The new billboard was designed to be as eyeable as possible.

meanings.definition: Attractive or pleasing to the eye.
meanings.sent1: The elegant dress was truly eyeable at the fashion show.
meanings.sent2: The sunset over the ocean was incredibly eyeable.
meanings.sent3: The adorable puppy in the window was very eyeable to passersby.
meanings.sent4: The sparkling diamond ring was so eyeable, it caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The garden was filled with eyeable flowers of all colors.
